name: Goblin
description: A small, sneaky creature that likes to ambush travelers.

name: Orc
description: A strong and brutish creature with a short temper.

name: Zombie
description: A slow-moving undead creature with a hunger for flesh.

name: Dragon
description: A fearsome beast with scales and fire breath.

name: Vampire
description: An elegant yet deadly creature of the night.

name: Slime
description: A gelatinous creature that absorbs whatever it touches.

name: Giant Spider
description: A large spider with venomous fangs.

name: Skeleton Warrior
description: An undead warrior that wields a sword.

name: Werewolf
description: A fierce beast that transforms under the full moon.

name: Demon
description: A malevolent creature from another realm.
